item.title: Rebalenced Death Interactions
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
While I do agree that somethings were flawed that shouldn’t mean it should be removed but reworked and rebalanced. Here are some of the flaws

  1. Poss got screwed over
  2. Psychic got a tad too OP
  3. Reaper got nerfed a bit
  4. DK was too OP

Lets fix em!

Possessor Gets Screwed

Go check out NightX’s post about death interactions and go under Possessor! Link: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dead-interactions/53222?u=htm

Call Of The Dead

Add back a less OP version of Priest like so and don’t give mystic back the passive cuz it doesn’t fit

The Priest, BD, Social

Passive 1: Call Of The Dead: same

Day Ability 1: Blessings: bless a player with death immunity for the night, 1 use.

Night Ability 1: My Dead Friends: Add a dead player’s passive onto another person for the night, you can use a dead player’s passives once, unlimited uses

2 of them can spawn in one game but it’s very unlikely

The Soulcatcher, Unseen, Social

Passive 1: Call Of The Dead: same

Day Ability 1: Hex: hex a player removing all their passives at night, will not inform the player, 2 use

Night Ability 1: Soul Catch: Catch a dead player’s soul preventing them from coming back as DK, 2 use

Night Ability 2: Kill And Catch: Catch a player’s soul when he dies, preventing him from talking to the dead or come back

Icy Touch

Keep chill as how it is right now because I love it!!!

DK OP

Idk how to fix this one but again here is NightX’s post https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dead-interactions/53222?u=htm and check out phys section

I recommend you to look at Aquilion’s post and NightX’s post about death interaction
